Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

: : Wolfenstein : :

Wolfenstein was still living on his own, since the nWo had disbanded and the others had left for Cybertron.

The comm from Perceptor was an unwelcome reminder that the Predacons would still want to kill him.

He opens a return channel.

Wolfenstein: What in the pit do you want, Perceptor? Don't tell me that the Predacons are still worried about killing a traitor like me?


airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote:
Perceptor:

Perceptor checked some Predacons' firms and bot that just left 
Predacons. He spotted Wolfstein and opened his com link and said 
with an ironical tone "Hello, Wolfstein... long time with out see 
you in base"
